testimonials.name: Richie Humphrey
testimonials.title: Founder of Offbeat Security
testimonials.comment: Amazing work. Amazing person. Worked so hard and vastly exceeded my expectations. Will be continuing to work together on an ongoing basis. 10/10 would recommend!

testimonials.name: Kutler
testimonials.title: Artist
testimonials.comment: Very understanding and very good communication. 10/10 would recommend and definitely hope to work with again soon :)

testimonials.name: Rose C
testimonials.title: Writer
testimonials.comment: Did an AMAZING job and was very responsive/easy to work with and super patient with additional modifications. Love the final product!
